ContentsDescription:
A mystical crystal that provides
a buff to all clan members.

From easy quests to the near-impossible!
I’m the Keeper, and I’m here to help.

ContentsDescription:
The more the merrier!
Please send all compliments to the chef.

Let me appraise your relics.
I’ll tell you their true worth.

You can craft potions that can be used
whenever you wish.

Light the fire in the fireplace and
everyone in the Clan Hall will gain Exp.

Mischievous pixies are making a mess!
Catch them for a reward.
